code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Greeting=()=>{const date=new Date();const hours=date.getHours();const months=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"];let month=months[date.getMonth()];let today="".concat(date.getUTCDate()," ").concat(month," ").concat(date.getFullYear());let greeting="";if(hours>0&&hours<12){greeting="Good morning";}else if(hours>=12&&hours<18){greeting="Good afternoon";}else if(hours>=18&&hours<21){greeting="Good evening";}else{greeting="Good night";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"py-7 px-10 max-sm:px-2 max-sm:py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" max-w-[1300px] max-lg:container flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:" text-white font-bold flex items-center gap-1 text-3xl max-sm:text-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"max-sm:text-3xl",children:"\uD83D\uDC4B"}),greeting]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:" text-white font-semibold text-lg max-sm:text-sm",children:today})})]})});};export default Greeting;
